content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 22 (APP):A delegation from Rawalpindi Bar Association on Wednesday held a meeting with the Minister for Law & Justice and Human Rights, Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar. The delegation was led by Sardar Manzar Bashir, President Rawalpindi Bar Association. The Law Minister was informed about the completion of various projects during the meeting. The Minister assured full cooperation from his side and the government. He congratulated the newly elected cabinet and assured that the issues of the bar would be resolved.
